website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, affordable, and comfortable cowboy hat that will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time.
pros: Sold in a variety of eye-catching colors
100% polyester construction provides outstanding quality and durability
One size fits all ensures the hat fits most adults
Faux suede finish further enhances the hat's overall appearance
cons: Hat looks and feels cheap in comparison to similar options
May be too large for some adults

customer_reviews.title: Great for 9 year-olds costume
customer_reviews.text: We bought the hat for my 9 year-old to wear when they were doing the Oklahoma Land Run at his school. I feel like my son is pretty average size for his age and the hat fit well and looked good. It was a little big (emphasis on little) but the string held it on. I wouldn’t have wanted it to be smaller. I also want to add since it is advertised as an adult hat that I feel like it would have been too little for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Bain Fam

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly nice quality! I ordered it for a Halloween costume and didn't expect much for the price. It fit my 6'1" solid built husband very well, and the quality is awesome! Sturdy, not cheap like it would break if bent. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: 7 Year old
customer_reviews.text: my 7 year old was so happy. My son has a large head but liked to be a cowboy. WE have some western store hats but we only wear them on occasion because they run 50 plus dollars a piece. I bought this after he asked to go out the house like woody again for the 1000th time. he enjoys wearing it. it fits like i assumed it would: a smallish adult/large kid like it said in the listing. its cheap felt but has held up. a good buy for any cow folk.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Yahooooo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teen who had a big head for a Toy Story Woody costume. I was so happy it fit his melon! I will say the actual width of the hat is more child size and not the same size as an adult cowboy hat, but it looked perfect for him with that kind of cartoon look. It is a soft warm milk chocolate brown color. This would also work well for kids. Great costume buy.
customer_reviews.author: KarenSue32

customer_reviews.title: Good Cowboy Hat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, who has a pretty big head, and it fit him great. He wore it for a school biography project dressed as Will Rodgers and this hat was perfect. It was pretty much what you would expect for a cowboy hat. This hat fit my smallish head just fine but I think if you were an adult with a normal to largish head it might be a bit small. Overall this was a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Quality hat
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this hat! For such a bargain price, I expected shoddy workmanship and materials, but I was pleasantly surprised! It's not "floppy", but somewhat firm, with a felt/suede-like fabric. The string that comes with it has a toggle to adjust under your chin and is pretty much a big shoestring, but if that bothers you, I feel it'd be easily switched out. Very glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Trinerella

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet durable
customer_reviews.text: There were mixed reviews about fit but I was confident that it would fit our 7 year old. It also fits me and I don’t have a small head. Decent quality and easy to add to it to dress it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka J

customer_reviews.title: A bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great bargain for the price. Good looking and not flimsy. I ordered a small and the fit was narrow enough but the length inside was still too long from the from to the back of the hat. Iadded some padding and it stayed on effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: EJW

customer_reviews.title: Great hat covered in
customer_reviews.text: Great hat covered in.. fire proof chemicals.. or something. I had to throw it away. It stunk up my house and burned my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rat

customer_reviews.title: Made a great Walking Dead cosplay hat!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Sturdy construction. Bought it to make it into a Carl Grimes hat from The Walking Dead. I had no trouble making the few modifications needed and was very pleased with the end result. Love getting a bargain and having it turn out so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Better for kids costume
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's go-western day... it actually fits his head perfect, so would not fit a man or most women's heads. The material bubbles easily. So good for kids costume or for go-western day perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B

customer_reviews.title: Dress up hat
customer_reviews.text: We did send this back as it's more of a dress up hat. Very flimsy and not durable. We bought it for a gag gift but it does not look like a cowboy hat.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: crushed beyond fixing.
customer_reviews.text: This hat arrived totally crushed. The box was large enough, but it had been shoved in. I attached a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Small town lady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality for cost
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for The Amazing Race that we held for the ladies at our church. They had to put on hats for the Village People and sing YMCA while standing in front of our local YMCA.😂
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: perfect for dress up!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for Christmas. he likes to pretend he is a cowboy on his bike. we looked at kids dress up cowboy hats and truth be told they cost twice as much as thus one and the reviews on fit werent great for preschool age kids. my son loves it and it is perfect for him to play with.
customer_reviews.author: LizN

customer_reviews.title: Small, Made of Foam
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this for a costume, but it is too tight and generally just too small. It is also made of a foam that doesn't breathe at all, so it is very hot to wear.
customer_reviews.author: threepenpals

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this for his toy story Woody costume. He is 5’6” and does not have a large head but this was a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made hat
customer_reviews.text: The quality will not last for extended use. I needed this for a prop for my photography class. It was good for the one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to the hat in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Did not look anything like the picture. The picture shows a hat made of leather or at least imitation leather. The hat is made of a plastic coated in a fake velvety material. This is something I'd expect to find as part of a party favor from a 5 year old's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: For a small child - absolutely will not fit an adult
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box to find a hat that is too small for my 9 year old. The description clearly states "Men's Adult". In the details it says "fits most adults" - I don't know any adult that this hat would fit.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Howdy, howdy, howdy
customer_reviews.text: Pulled through in a pinch and was easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good price good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a costume prop for sure but its actually a really good one. It came out the box shaped perfectly and fits good I have an average adult Male head. It looks so good on me my wife is making me get a real one like it to wear all the time now. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: DAVEGBRUNELLE

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Halloween costume, but was actually impressed with the quality! My husband got lots of compliments and we live in cowboy country.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: good looking
customer_reviews.text: This hat was ordered for photo booth and it was a huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Kristin F

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Material is good but the hat shape is weird and the fit sucks
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A Smith

customer_reviews.title: VERY COSTUMEY!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cowboy hat. It wasn't really what I was looking for and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Campanelli

customer_reviews.title: Looks authentic
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect I have very thick hair went nice with my cowboy themed outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a better quality than I had expected
customer_reviews.text: the manufacture was done well, good materials. Better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Jack D

customer_reviews.title: For kids, Not for adults.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard material. Does not fit well. For kids is fine, not adults.
customer_reviews.author: Dinozzo-VA

customer_reviews.title: This hat went perfect with my outfit for my western themed birthday party
customer_reviews.text: This hat went perfect with my outfit for my western themed birthday party. I have a larger size head which made me nervous with not being able to try it on but it fit perfectly. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel G.

customer_reviews.title: Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew so he could add the colonel tassel cords to it and make a cheaper version of "Coral" from The Walking Dead costume. Working Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price its an excellent costume hat. After thanksgiving, I can give it to the kiddos for dress up. Durable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: The Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Good for Toy Story costume
customer_reviews.text: Used for a Woody Toy Story costume at WDW. Worked perfect! It feels kind of cheap, but photographs well.
customer_reviews.author: scc917

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend, who has a rather large head, wore this for an Indiana Jones costume. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is a $10 hat so i wasn’t expecting much from it. it’s a nice hat and i’ll definitely wear it to parties. however, the hat doesn’t look like the image that is displayed. Nice hat but hate how it isn’t the same as the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Fabric comes apart from the hat. Adhesive and stitching are poor. Hat looks good if construction was better
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Used for a Rick/Carl Grimes costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for Rick and Carl Grimes costume. Worked out great after adding a yellow chord. I will use it in future photoshoots and cosplay. It's a good material. The hat is thick and not flimsy or floppy. Held it's shape well through shipping.
customer_reviews.author: arsallotTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: The person receiving this item likes it. He lost the one he had. I like the look on him and it suits his personality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap suede hat. Better than expected and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koplin

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a toy
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my daughter to use because it looked like a toy
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grate

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: The quality was fine, but it was too small, and definitely wouldn't fit over a wig.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fit my kids who all have huge heads!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic cowboy hat for costume and fun. Sturdy, nice finish. I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great, but it feels and looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: It arrived crumpled in a ball. Doing everything I can to shape it, but it’s trash
customer_reviews.author: Maui Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a Halloween costume if you’re being a cowboy or cowgirl! Looks great with a costume and it’s super cheap! Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Trash...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is like it cam e from dollar tree. Thin, cheap material, and bent when it came. To be honest, I could've been happy with a dollar tree hat.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: A great product and hat! It blocked the sun from my eyes and keep my head protected. It could use a little more ventilation in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Move the tag
customer_reviews.text: I like the hat but for some reason instead of putting the tag inside of the hat they put it on the rim. The sewing falls apart if you try to remove it. Terrible placement of tag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DaSilva

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat fits my skeleton head very well. Love the ties on it and they help to hold it on the head of the skeleton.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a costume
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap hat and it looks it. Good for a costume.
customer_reviews.author: janee

customer_reviews.title: Needs better stitching
customer_reviews.text: The hat was very cute and fit as expected, but the stitching started to come undone after the first time wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: This hat is NOTHING like the picture. Don’t be fooled. This is a hat for dogs practically. God would look at this hat and cringe.
customer_reviews.author: Kamerun Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality Hat as a meme gift for a 21st birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit!
customer_reviews.text: This hat was very large. It was made of a sturdy material and fulfilled it's roll as a cowboy hat for Halloween. I wouldn't use it everyday. Thanks, Eurypharynx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe nothing you hear and about half of what you read
customer_reviews.text: Well if I was about 6 years old it might fit It said it was o mans hat but it ain’t-it’s a youth hat
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat for themed parties and events.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, very nice hat for themed parties and events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. A bit small but he can still wear it
customer_reviews.author: Danishia Arias

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hat
customer_reviews.text: The hat looked awesome and was a great price! It was much sturdier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fora Halloween Costume
customer_reviews.text: The fit was good and overall was fine for a Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my cosplay. It did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mann

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Halloween or just a costume for something. Wouldn’t use it as an everyday hat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. High quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. High quality. We used to buy costumes from another store/site but this Amazon provider not only has better prices, but also better quality. This hat is of such high quality, you can actually wear it to an event (not sure how it would hold up under excessive sweat, and/or rain, etc, so use your intelligence/discretion). Definitely a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Love

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for the price. Used it for my cowgirl Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the cosplay wanting it for. Also turned out nicer than I expected - especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hat fit nicely, as expected, and seemed to be good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: momr

customer_reviews.title: It is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay you dont get a good hat. It feels like felt on cardboard. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: William H Knott

customer_reviews.title: Read purchase info carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat satisfied but very cheap looking and shipping cost not what agreed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bullard

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to anyone who can use it
customer_reviews.text: As described fit well, I recommend to anyone who can use it.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy as can be. Ready for my costume party. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLIENT

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but way too small
customer_reviews.text: Fine, but way too small. If you consider your self to have even a slightly large head at all, steer clear. Because I don't; and this doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Men's cowboy hat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hat,Nice fit perfect for Rick Grimes walking dead sheriff hat-can purchase braided rope with acorn's separately for added affect
customer_reviews.author: Mark Costello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the occassion. it looks better tan I expected and it fits well for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head so maybe this would fit an average head..!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Alan Shepheard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: It fits me so it's definitely adult sized but it's my sons Carl Grimes hat so it's too big but it's supposed to be. Good quality and durable. It's the color shown. The only draw back is that the end of the tightening strings are like shoes laces and will pull out of the adjuster easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kyodi1996

customer_reviews.title: It looked awesome and the quality was way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this with his Woody costume at Halloween. It looked awesome and the quality was way better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: he loved it, Thanks alot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew, he loved it, Thanks alot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great hat, low price
customer_reviews.text: this hat really should be more expensive than it is. it's really great. looks great, fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Phillips

product_meta.title: Forum Novelties Men's Adult Suede Cowboy Hat
product_meta.description: Top off your costume with this suede cowboy hat for more than 30 years, forum novelties has been a leader in the costume industry, as well as the joke, trick, magic, and novelty gift item business. Forum offers over 8,000 items to choose from, ranging from baby costumes, to adult and plus-size costumes, to pet costumes. Look to forum novelties for all of your Halloween, luau, Christmas, mardi gras, and St. Patrick's day supplies. From funny to frightening, forum has it all
feature_bullets: Costume cowboy hat with faux suede finish
Available in several colors for a variety of looks
Additional accessories and costume pieces sold separately
Made by Forum Novelties, a leader in costumes and novelty products for more than 30 years
